## Validation

### Required checks (run from `/node`)

- [ ] `npm run lint`
- [ ] `npm run test`
- [ ] `npm run build`

### Additional evidence

- [ ] Screenshots/UI evidence (if UI changed)
- [ ] API request/response examples (if API changed)
- [ ] Migration notes (if DB schema changed)

## Risk Review

- [ ] No secrets added
- [ ] No unsupported compliance claims added
- [ ] Backward compatibility preserved (or breaking change is documented)
